cards.name: Skyforge Drone
cards.effect: Swift — This Unit ignores SPD restrictions on the turn it enters play.
cards.flavour: Built fast. Built cheap. Built again.

cards.name: Skyforge Scout
cards.effect:
Once per turn, when this Unit declares an attack, reduce the target’s DEF by 1 until end of 
your turn.
cards.flavour: See first. Survive longer.

cards.name: Skyforge Gunner
cards.effect: Pierce — Excess combat damage may be dealt to another enemy Unit.
cards.flavour: Fire solutions calculated. Collateral irrelevant.

cards.name: Skyforge Interceptor
cards.effect: Swift — This Unit ignores SPD restrictions on the turn it enters play.
cards.flavour: Nothing outruns the command signal.

cards.name: Skyforge Bulwark
cards.effect: Guard - Enemy units must attack this unit first if able.
cards.flavour: Hold the line. Replace the losses.

cards.name: Skyforge Overseer
cards.effect:
Once per turn, when you deploy a Unit, gain  1⚡. Other Units you control gain +1 ATK
and +1 DEF while this card is deployed.
cards.flavour: All unit, acknowledge command.

cards.name: Scrapland Scavenger
cards.effect: When another Unit you control is destroyed, gain  1⚡. (Once per turn.)
cards.flavour: They wait for the fighting to end.

cards.name: Ashfang Hound
cards.effect: NONE
cards.flavour: Steel in its jaws. Hunger in its eyes.

cards.name: Wasteland Sentinel
cards.effect: Guard - Enemy units must attack this unit first.
cards.flavour: Its watch never ended.

cards.name: Carrion Drifter
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit is destroyed, this Unit gains +1 ATK until start of your next turn.
cards.flavour: Death leaves opportunities behind.

cards.name: Dustrunner Nomad
cards.effect: Retreat - When this unit destroys another unit, return this unit back to your hand.
cards.flavour: If you stop moving, the desert decides.

cards.name: Ironhide Behemoth
cards.effect: This unit enters play exhausted.
cards.flavour: It does not chase. It waits.

cards.name: Signal Leech
cards.effect:
When this unit destroys another unit, drain 1⚡ from your opponent. (They gain 
1 less ⚡, you gain +1 ⚡.)
cards.flavour: It feeds on what keeps others alive.

cards.name: Gravefield Lurker
cards.effect:
When this Unit is destroyed, place it in your graveyard pile as normal. At the start of your next 
turn, you may pay 3 ⚡ to return Gravefield Lurker from your graveyard pile to play exhausted. 
If you do not, it remains in the graveyard pile.
cards.flavour: Nothing stays burried for long.

cards.name: Wanderer of Ash
cards.effect: When this Unit enters play, exhaust up to 1 other target Unit.
cards.flavour: Some say it walks between moments.

cards.name: Override
cards.effect: Choose a unit, disable that unit's effects until end of your turn.

cards.name: Software Update
cards.effect: Target Unit gains +1 ATK and -1 DEF until end of turn.

cards.name: Velocity Patch
cards.effect: Target Unit gains +2 SPD until end of turn. That Unit enters play exhausted next turn.

cards.name: Reboot
cards.effect: Remove all negative effects from target Unit. That Unit enters play exhausted next turn.

cards.name: Arcane Surge
cards.effect: Gain 3 ⚡. At the start of your next turn, gain 0 ⚡ instead of gaining ⚡2.

cards.name: Veil of Binding
cards.effect: Choose a Unit. That Unit cannot retaliate during combat this turn.

cards.name: Food Rations
cards.effect: Choose a Unit. That Unit gains +1 DEF until start of your next turn.

cards.name: Travelling Merchant
cards.effect: Destroy opponents active field card.

cards.name: Lockdown
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit enters play, target that Unit. It cannot attack or use abilities until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Counter Measure
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit declares an attack, target that Unit. Cancel its attack this turn.

cards.name: Self-Destruct
cards.effect: When a Unit you control is destroyed from an enemy attack, target the attacking Unit. Destroy it.

cards.name: Decoy Protocol
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit declares an attack, redirect that attack to target another Unit you control.

cards.name: Flute of Slumber
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit becomes ready, target that Unit. Exhaust it until the start of the controller's next turn.

cards.name: Return to Sender
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit declares an attack, target that Unit. Return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Assembly Line
cards.effect: Skyforge Units you play cost 1 less ⚡to deploy. (Minimum cost 1.)

cards.name: Relay Node
cards.effect: At the start of your turn, if you have a Skyforge Unit deployed, gain 1 ⚡. (Maxium gain 1).

cards.name: Kill Zone
cards.effect: When a Skyforge Unit defeats an enemy Unit, gain 1 ⚡ in your next turn.

cards.name: Rustfields
cards.effect: When a Skyforge Unit is destroyed, gain 1 ⚡at the start of your next turn. (Max 1.)

cards.name: Miasma Drifter
cards.effect: When this Unit enters play, Wither an enemy Unit.
cards.flavour: “The fog moves with intent now.”

cards.name: Miasma Husk
cards.effect: When this Unit is destroyed, Corrupt an enemy Unit.
cards.flavour: “Whatever it once was is no longer relevant.”

cards.name: Miasma Stalker
cards.effect: Once per turn, when this Unit attacks an Exhausted Unit, Wither that Unit.
cards.flavour: “It waits until resistance has already failed.”

cards.name: Miasma Spore Swarm
cards.effect: When this Unit is destroyed, Wither an enemy Unit.
cards.flavour: “Each breath feeds it.”

cards.name: Miasma Blightcrawler
cards.effect: At the start of your turn, Wither the enemy Unit with the highest DEF. (If tied, choose.)
cards.flavour: “Where it settles, nothing remains whole.”

cards.name: Miasma Corruptor
cards.effect: Once per turn, when you Wither a Corrupted enemy Unit, Wither that Unit again.
cards.flavour: “Decay is not destruction. It is preparation.”

cards.name: Miasma Rot-Titan
cards.effect: When this Unit declares an attack, Wither the defending Unit.
cards.flavour: “Built from everything that refused to die.”

cards.name: The Living Miasma
cards.effect:
Enemy Units are Corrupted while this Unit is deployed. 
At the start of your turn, Wither all enemy Units.
cards.flavour: “This land breathes now — and it is hungry.”

cards.name: Knoxx the Engineer
cards.effect:
When this Unit enters play, choose one:
• Ready a Unit you control, or
• Disable an active Field until end of turn.
cards.flavour: “If it still hums, I can fix it.”

cards.name: Fog-Walker Guide
cards.effect: Once per turn, you may Retreat a Unit you control.
cards.flavour: “Step where I step. Breathe when I breathe.”

cards.name: Ashara the Bone-Seer
cards.effect: Once per turn, when a Unit is destroyed, look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.
cards.flavour: “The dead whisper louder than the living.”

cards.name: Edda the Thief
cards.effect: When this Unit deals combat damage, the opponent loses 1 ⚡.
cards.flavour: “You won’t miss it until it’s gone.”

cards.name: Scrap Gladiator
cards.flavour: “Steel, bone, or fist — it all breaks the same.”

cards.name: Kalzar of the Scribes
cards.flavour: “History survives where people do not.”

cards.name: Beast-Tamer Tarn
cards.flavour: “Fear is a leash, if you know how to hold it.”

cards.name: Encroaching Fog
cards.effect:
Apply Wither to all enemy Units.
(Each affected Unit has its DEF reduced by 1 until the start of your next turn.)

cards.name: Toxic Sludge
cards.effect:
Choose an enemy Unit.
If that Unit is Corrupted, apply Wither to it twice.

cards.name: Petrify
cards.effect:
Choose an enemy Unit.
That Unit cannot declare attacks during its next turn.

cards.name: Choking Spores
cards.effect: Exhaust all enemy Units.

cards.name: Eviction Notice
cards.effect: Destroy the currently active enemy Field card.

cards.name: Emergency Repairs
cards.effect:
Choose a Unit you control.
That Unit gains +2 DEF until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Adrenal Rush
cards.effect:
Ready a Unit you control.
That Unit gains +1 ATK until end of turn.
(This Technique may only be played during your Deploy Phase.)

cards.name: Salvage the Ruins
cards.effect:
Draw a card.
If you control no active Field, draw an additional card.

cards.name: Miasma Potion
cards.effect:
When an enemy Unit is deployed, target that Unit. Corrupt it, then apply Wither to it.
(Reduce its DEF by 1 until the start of your next turn.)

cards.name: Rot beneath the Surface
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit declares an attack, target that Unit. Reduce its ATK by -1 until end of the controller's turn.

cards.name: Foglash
cards.effect:
When an enemy Technique card is played, negate that Technique.
(That Technique has no effect and is discarded.)

cards.name: Earthquake
cards.effect: When an enemy Field card becomes active, destroy that Field card immediately.

cards.name: Counter-Sigil
cards.effect:
When an enemy Trap card is activated, negate that Trap.
(That Trap does not resolve and is discarded.)

cards.name: False Step
cards.effect: When an enemy Unit declares an attack, target that Unit. Cancel its attack and exhaust it.

cards.name: Lowlands Mist
cards.effect:
At the start of each player’s turn, apply Wither to all Units that player controls.
(Each affected Unit has its DEF reduced by 1 until the start of that player’s next turn.)

cards.name: Blight Pools
cards.effect:
Whenever an enemy Unit enters play, apply Wither to that Unit.
(Reduce its DEF by 1 until the start of its controller’s next turn.)

cards.name: Rotfall Expanse
cards.effect:
At the end of each turn, if a player controls 3 or more Units, that player must choose and destroy 
one of those Units.
